body.name: Ultimate Repair Toner for face - Face Moisturizer Made from Tea Tree Leaf Water for Sensitive Skin - Mild Exfoliating Daily Facial Toner - Acne, Sebum and Oiliness Care - Facial Skin Care
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 29 mins
features: 🌿 What is DMZ and why it's clean ? - The Korean demilitarized zone (DMZ) is a border barrier that divides the peninsula roughly in half. It was established to serve as a buffer zone of South Korea. It retains primitive nature as it has not been reached until 60 years after the Korean War

🌿PURE and CLEAN INGREDIENTS - As human access to the DMZ has been restricted for decades, its natural environment has been perfectly preserved. It is not just natural plant extract but pure and clean natural plant complex that goes to your skin

🌿 ANTIOXIDATION From 3 NATURAL EXTRACTS - Instead of chemical ingredient, the cream concentrates the nature ingredients - Orostachys Japonica extract, Ligularia Fishceri Leaf extract, Taraxacum Coreanum Flower extract. 3 natural ingredients can protect skin from reactive oxygen, enhances red skin ton and relaxes the skin gently.
🌿 Rose Water - soothing, hydrating and revitalizing properties. it balances the skin's pH and is an effective toner for any dry or troubling skin.
🌿 Plus Ingredients - Witch Hazel, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Pathenol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It feels very refreshing and clean
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and most skin toners leave my skin with a burning sensation. This is a game changer because it leaves my skin feeling fresh and refreshed without any irritation. I like the fact that they only use natural and pure ingredients with no strong scents added.You will feel the difference with each use and it is very reasonably priced for the size. I recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturize My Skin Well
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product on my oily skin. I decided to try this toner based on the amazing reviews it has received, and how popular it is. I am more than satisfied with the results on my skin shows it. I needed something a little, less aggressive and more nurturing and this is it! Thrilled over the moon to have found this product. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for daily use.
reviews.reviewText: The wife uses this after every shower. She says that it can definitely be used daily. She uses this on her face before using a face mask. It leaves her face feeling lightly moisturized. It doesn't leave any unpleasant residue. It absorbs into the skin beautifully and leaves the skin soft to the touch. If you use too much, you may notice an oily feeling.What I liked about it: A little bit goes a long way.What I didn't like: It can be a bit heavy if you're someone with oily skin.Overall, the wife recommends this face moisturizer if you have combo to dry skin. The wife does not recommend this for oily skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Permeates well and no scent
reviews.reviewText: I only use cosmetics made in Korea. It boasts good quality, but the price is actually a little high. This is a very low price for good quality. I am very satisfied with this product. It permeates well and has no scent. It feels pure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: the first day i used it, i felt good. it soaks in. i haven't used it for a few days yet, so it's really really good it too fast to say, but there's no objection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle And Effective Toner
reviews.reviewText: This toner is unlike any I've used before. It's not a liquid, but almost like a serum. The ingredients are natural and gentle, and my sensitive skin loves it. There is no harsh stinging like you get with alcohol-based toners, and my face feels soft and fresh after applying. I have long been a fan of K-Beauty products, and this toner is no exception. For both oily teen skin and dry mature skin, you can't find a better toner. Very impressed with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this every day
reviews.reviewText: I really like Biones products. I have ordered several and they've all been top notch quality yet reasonably priced. This toner is fantastic and no matter how well I think I cleaned my face and removed my makeup, this toner always finds a little bit of dirt and grime left behind. Given the price point of some skin care products, like most Biones, this is well valued for the good job it does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new daily toner
reviews.reviewText: I'm thrilled to share my experience with the BIONES Ultimate Repair Toner, and I'm pleased to give it a well-deserved 5 out of 5 rating. As someone with fairly oily and sensitive skin, I've been on the lookout for a toner that suits my skin type and concerns, and this product has truly impressed me.Before using this toner, I typically relied on witch hazel for my skincare routine. However, since I started using the BIONES Ultimate Repair Toner over a week ago, I've noticed a remarkable improvement in the appearance and feel of my skin. My face feels significantly more moisturized, and the overall texture has improved. It's as if my skin has regained a more youthful and vibrant look.One of the standout features of this toner is its efficiency. A small amount on a cotton pad goes a long way in covering my entire face, making it an economical choice. Unlike some toners that are overly thin and watery, this toner has a slightly thicker consistency, which I find pleasant. It doesn't have the harsh feel of alcohol on the skin; instead, it provides a refreshing and clean sensation.Another significant benefit of this toner is its suitability for sensitive skin. I appreciate that it doesn't irritate my skin and, instead, works gently to address concerns like acne, excess sebum, and oiliness. This toner has become an essential part of my daily skincare routine, and I can confidently say that it has made a positive difference.
